column2: Baltoji Ranka neturėtų per daug pasitikėti Nuogąja Akimi ir atvirkščiai
Prieš ką kovoji, kam padedi ir kur yra kovos vieta, nusako tai, kuri draugiška karalystė pastebi ir, galbūt, vertina tavo pastangas
Karalystės informacijos šaltinis — skautai, tai pat ir belaisviai, kankinami požemiuose. Išlaisvinti kalinius ir dislokuoti skautus gali sužaloti priešą.
Verta prisiminti, jog kiekvienoje karalystėje yra skirtingu valiutų Resursų taškai, kurie leidžia apsirūpinti įranga bei kariais toje karalystėje.
The military collapse of a kingdom is irreversible. Mordor can never suffer such a fate, but the war will be over if its military power is contained and all its allied are defeated.
It takes a cool mind (INT) to avoid panicking to a Nazgul. It takes a perfect control of one's horse to avoid that it panics.
You can rest on the world map by holding down the space bar. However, wounded party members will heal faster while resting in cities.
To quickly claim and give items away in inventory window, hold down control key while you left click.
You can leave any location instantly by pressing the tab key, and press Backspace key during battle to bring the command interface.
Animals can panic near trolls and olog-hais. Beware!
Manpower represents a crucial resource of a kingdom: taking and keeping troops under your command will consume Resource Points of the respective faction.
You can give orders to your party while in battle. You can hold down the shift key to zoom-in while aiming at distant enemies.
